triples.name: GPT-3
triples.relevance: GPT-3 is one of the prominent language models evaluated in the HELM benchmark study.

triples.name: PaLM
triples.relevance: PaLM is a large language model developed by Google that is benchmarked in the HELM evaluation.

triples.name: ChatGPT
triples.relevance: ChatGPT is an OpenAI chatbot evaluated in the HELM benchmark for its capabilities and limitations.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Large language models are the primary focus of the HELM evaluation framework.

triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: Language models are the core technology being evaluated and analyzed in the HELM study.

triples.name: Benchmarking
triples.relevance: HELM proposes a new comprehensive benchmarking methodology for evaluating language models holistically.

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: HELM introduces a comprehensive computing benchmark with 16 core scenarios and 7 metrics for language model evaluation.
